name: Wheat
description: Elevate your recipes with our high-quality wheat, perfect for everything from fresh bread to nutritious cereals.

name: Rice
description: Freshly harvested and expertly milled, our rice promises exceptional taste and perfect texture every time.

name: Bulgur
description: Our bulgur is expertly processed to maintain its natural goodness, offering a quick and easy way to enhance your meals with nutritious whole grains.

name: Corn
description: Freshly harvested sweet corn, perfect for boiling, grilling, or roasting! Get it while it's in season and enjoy the sweet taste of summer. Support local farmers and buy from us today!

name: Oats
description: Get your oat on! Our oats are carefully sourced from local farms to ensure the highest quality and freshness. Perfect for oatmeal, baking, or as a healthy snack.

name: Quinoa
description: Quinoa lovers unite! Our quinoa is carefully sourced from local farms to ensure the highest quality and freshness. Perfect for cooking, baking, or as a healthy snack.

name: Rye
description: Get Rye and make oil as per your need

name: Beans
description: Experience the rich, creamy flavor of our carefully selected beans! Perfect for vegans, vegetarians, and anyone looking for a healthy, protein-packed meal option.

name: Beet Root
description: Add a pop of color and a burst of nutrition to your meals with our vibrant, juicy beetroot! Packed with vitamins, minerals, and antioxidants, our beetroot is the perfect addition to any salad, smoothie, or recipe.

name: Bitter Guord
description: Experience the unique flavor and numerous health benefits of our premium bitter gourd! Rich in vitamins, minerals, and antioxidants, our bitter gourd is the perfect addition to any meal.

name: Brinjal
description: Experience the rich, meaty flavor of our premium brinjal! Whether you're grilling, roasting, or sautéing, our brinjal is sure to impress with its tender texture and deep flavor.

name: Cabbage
description: Get ready to boost your health with our nutrient-dense cabbage! High in fiber, vitamins, and minerals, our cabbage is the perfect way to support your overall health and wellbeing.

name: Capsicum
description: Add a pop of color and flavor to your meals with our vibrant, crunchy capsicum! Rich in vitamins, minerals, and antioxidants, our capsicum is the perfect addition to any dish.

name: Cauliflower
description: Get ready to elevate your cooking with our artisanal cauliflower! Sourced from local farms and carefully curated, our cauliflower is the perfect choice for chefs and home cooks alike.

name: Green Chilli
description: Add a burst of flavor and heat to your meals with our fresh, crunchy green chilli! Perfect for adding a spicy kick to your favorite dishes.

name: Cucumber
description: Experience the vibrant green color and snappy texture of our fresh green cucumber! Whether you're using it in a salad, as a crudité, or as a topping, our green cucumber is sure to impress.

name: Ginger
description: Unleash the power of green ginger in your cooking! Our fresh, vibrant green ginger is perfect for adding a burst of flavor and nutrition to your favorite dishes.

name: Jackfruit
description: Discover the versatility of our fresh green jackfruit! Use it in tacos, curries, BBQ, or as a meat substitute in your favorite recipes.

name: Lady Finger
description: Add some crunch and flavor to your meals with our fresh green lady fingers! Perfect for sautéing, frying, or adding to soups and stews.

name: Onion
description: Add a punch of flavor and freshness to your dishes with our crisp and delicious green onions! Perfect for salads, sandwiches, and as a garnish for soups and entrees.

name: Pea
description: Take your cooking to the next level with the versatility of our onions! Use them in everything from burgers and sandwiches to soups and stews.

name: Pointed Guord
description: Experience the unique flavor and texture of our pointed gourds! Perfect for stir-fries, curries, and soups, these versatile vegetables will add a new dimension to your cooking.

name: Potato
description: Unleash the flavor and nutrition of our premium potatoes! Perfect for baking, mashing, roasting, or frying, these spuds are a staple for any kitchen.

name: Pumpkin
description: Get ready to fall in love with the sweet and slightly nutty taste of our pumpkin! High in vitamins and minerals, they're a healthy and delicious addition to any meal.

name: Spinach
description: Unlock the nutritional power of our fresh spinach! Packed with iron, calcium, and vitamins, this superfood is the perfect addition to any healthy diet.

name: Sponge Guord
description: Experience the unique texture and flavor of our sponge gourd! With its soft, spongy interior and mild taste, it's the perfect addition to soups, stews, and stir-fries.

name: Tomato
description: Sink your teeth into the juicy sweetness of our vine-ripened tomatoes! Perfect for snacking, salads, sandwiches, and sauces.
